TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit DataObjectAttribute extends System.Attribute

Docs.summary: Identifies a type as an object suitable for binding to an object. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Use the DataObjectAttribute attribute to identify an object as suitable for use by an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> object. Design-time classes such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner> class use the DataObjectAttribute attribute to present suitable objects to bind to an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> object.
For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
## Examples The following code example demonstrates how you can apply the DataObjectAttribute attribute to indicate an object is suitable for binding to an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> object. In this example, the `NorthwindData` object is intended for use with an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> object.
[!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.DataObjectMethodAttribute#3](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.componentmodel._46_1.vb)] [!code-cs[System.ComponentModel.DataObjectMethodAttribute#3](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.componentmodel._46_1.cs)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute.IsDataObject%2A> property is set to `true` when you use the DataObjectAttribute constructor.
## Examples The following code example demonstrates using the DataObjectAttribute constructor.
[!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.DataObjectMethodAttribute#3](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/m-system.componentmodel._10_1.vb)] [!code-cs[System.ComponentModel.DataObjectMethodAttribute#3](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/m-system.componentmodel._10_1.cs)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(bool isDataObject) cil managed

Docs.param: if the object is suitable for binding to an object; otherwise, .
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class and indicates whether an object is suitable for binding to an object.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Use the DataObjectAttribute constructor to indicate to a design-time class such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner> class that an object should be excluded from the list of suitable objects for binding to an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> object.
The <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute.IsDataObject%2A> property is set to the value of the `isDataObject` parameter.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute DataObject

Docs.summary: Indicates that the class is suitable for binding to an object at design time. This field is read-only.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The DataObject field returns a new <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute> object with the <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute.IsDataObject%2A> property set to `true`.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute Default

Docs.summary: Represents the default value of the class, which indicates that the class is suitable for binding to an object at design time. This field is read-only.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The Default field defines an instance of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute> class initialized with the <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute.%23ctor%2A> constructor, which sets the <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute.IsDataObject%2A> property to `true`.

Docs.param: An object to compare with this instance of .
Docs.summary: Determines whether this instance of fits the pattern of another object.
Docs.returns: if this instance is the same as the instance specified by the parameter; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks This method determines whether this instance of <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute> fits the pattern of another object.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance int32 GetHashCode() cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns the hash code for this instance.
Gets a value indicating whether an object should be considered suitable for binding to an object at design time.
Docs.value: if the object should be considered suitable for binding to an object; otherwise, .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance bool IsDefaultAttribute() cil managed

Docs.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the current value of the attribute is the default value for the attribute.
Docs.returns: if the current value of the attribute is the default; otherwise, .

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute NonDataObject

Docs.summary: Indicates that the class is not suitable for binding to an object at design time. This field is read-only.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The NonDataObject field returns a new <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute> object with the <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute.IsDataObject%2A> property set to `false`.
